column1: #text=I have a large garden and lots of flower beds .
#text=But this year I wanted to plant some small fruit trees in my garden .
#text=I went to the nursery and picked out a small dwarf apple tree I wanted to plant .
#text=The tree was young and was basically a very small trunk with two branches .
#text=I brought it home and read the instructions for planting it .
#text=The whole I needed to dig was 18 inches across and 1 foot deep .
#text=I used my garden shovel to break up the grass and dig the hole .
#text=I saved the dirt in my wheelbarrow to put back in the whole when I was done .
#text=I put the small tree in the whole and filled the hole with water .
#text=When the water had saturated the earth I then shoveled thew leftover dirt back in the hole .
#text=I think I will get several more fruit trees to plant .
